author: Pamela Muse
text:
Two great PBB Events Coming Up:

Last call to RSVP for Wednesday, June 12th Fiscal Health & Wellness Through Priority Based Budgeting forum in Portland OR.  For more information and to reserve a set, visit http://elgl.org/2013/05/21/fiscal-health-wellness-through-priority-based-budgeting/
Center for Priority Based Budgeting 2013 Annual Conference: A Summit of Leading Practices is July 9-10, 2013 at the Hilton Crystal City Hotel, Arlington, VA.  .  For more information and to register visit http://pbbconference.org/index.html   The PBB Conference is brought to you by the Center for Priority Based Budgeting, ICMA and the Alliance for Innovation

Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Two Priority Based Budgeting Events
